mapper.select: select HIGHLIGHT_ID , A.USER_ID , PAGE_ID , C.COLOR_HEX , TEXT from user_highlight A INNER JOIN user_theme B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.STATUS='1' INNER JOIN THEME_INFO C ON A.THEME_SN = C.THEME_SN AND B.THEME_ID = C.THEME_ID WHERE HIGHLIGHT_ID = #{highlightId}

select HIGHLIGHT_ID , A.USER_ID , A.PAGE_ID , C.COLOR_HEX , TEXT , PAGE_URL from user_highlight A INNER JOIN user_theme B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.STATUS='1' INNER JOIN THEME_INFO C ON A.THEME_SN = C.THEME_SN AND B.THEME_ID = C.THEME_ID INNER JOIN page_info D ON A.PAGE_ID = D.PAGE_ID WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} and PAGE_URL = #{pageUrl} AND A.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY A.UPDATE_DATE DESC, A.CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT PAGE_ID , PAGE_URL FROM PAGE_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = '1' ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE DESC, CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE user_theme SET STATUS = (CASE WHEN THEME_ID = #{themeId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
